metadata.Title: CVE-2018-11577 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description:
Liblouis 3.5.0 has a Segmentation fault in lou_logPrint in logging.c.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-11577` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

liblouis-bin - 2.6.4-2ubuntu0.2
liblouis-data - 2.6.4-2ubuntu0.2
liblouis9 - 2.6.4-2ubuntu0.2
python-louis - 2.6.4-2ubuntu0.2
python3-louis - 2.6.4-2ubuntu0.2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: liblouis package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.6.4-2ubuntu0.2').
